title: Dark Harvest should be repurposed as a keystone for on-hit reliant farming junglers like Yi or Udyr
body: ...You know, since most assassin junglers with a functioning brain would just go Electrocute anyways, it'd be cool for the old flare/devourer junglers to make a comeback again.

replies.body:
> devourer junglers to make a comeback again.

You mean Udyr, Xin and Yi aren't strong enough for you? O_o

> functioning brain

I feel like the entire reason you'd be playing Udyr/Xin/Yi in the first place, is because you don't have this...

I feel dark harvest tends to be good on the farming assassin junglers (kayn, shaco, rengar, kha'zix, nocturne, yi, eveylynn, ect..) and is especially useful for shaco since shaco doesn't really need electrocute early, but tends to need the dark harvest burst lategame since his raw burst is alot lower than comparable assassins.

Dark harvest is an assassin gameplay option, sacrificing earlygame damage and pressure, in exchange for faster burst and better damage post20-25min. Procing electrocute lategame is difficult for some assassins without dying since their combos have longer cast times. It's also especially good on assassins who can chain kills like kha'zix and yi, to regain soul charge.

I think dark harvest is a fine concept, and aa based junglers have other options through precision (the sustained damage one, as opposed to burst in domination) in lethal tempo or press the attack that are superior mid-lategame.
Evelynn has a lot of viable keystone runes though.
I'm not saying she doesn't. I'm just saying Dark Harvest is among them.
